title: Dr. Jay Bhaumik and Koti Vanga Acquire Genesis Engineering, Positioning Company for Strategic Growth
summary: PLANO, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Genesis Engineering, a leading aerospace and high-tech manufacturing solutions provider, today announced a major change in ownership with Dr. Jay Bhaumik and Koti Vanga joining as the companys principal shareholders. This strategic acquisition positions Genesis Engineering for accelerated growth, expanded capabilities, and enhanced client impact.
